definition: to let go/to cast/to let loose/to discharge/to give expression to
fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)

sentences.english: The island of Sardinia is home to some of the world's oldest people.
sentences.chinese: 世界上很多最長壽的老人都出自撒丁島。

sentences.english: Brynildsen is also playing catch up following his retirement in Sardinia.
sentences.chinese: 撒丁島退賽的布呂尼爾森也在扮演者追趕者的角色。

sentences.english: The five men boarded the flight from Sardinia to London.
sentences.chinese: 五個人登上了從撒丁島到倫敦的班機。

sentences.english: He lives in Sardinia and many places in the world.
sentences.chinese: 他居住在撒丁島和世界上許多其他地方。

sentences.english: This sighting occurred during my dive to a sunken wreck off Sardinia.
sentences.chinese: 這是我在撒丁島附近的沉船殘骸處潛水時所見的景象。

sentences.english: He will be visiting four cities including Cagliari in Sardinia.
sentences.chinese: 他將會參觀四個城市，包括撒丁島的卡利亞里。

sentences.english: How does a pleb like me know about the best hotel on Sardinia?
sentences.chinese: 我這樣的草民怎會有機會知道撒丁島頂級酒店的盛況？

pinyin: Yi1 bi3 li4 ya4 Ban4 dao3

definition: Emirate/Sheikdom/used as translation for country under a chief
Andes mountain chain of South America
